articles.title: US Fed downshifts campaign to tame inflation but still 'some ways to go' - CNA
articles.description: WASHINGTON: The Federal Reserve moderated its all-out campaign to cool US inflation on Wednesday (Dec 14), lifting the benchmark lending rate by a half percentage point though warning there is still "some ways to go". America's central bank has taken aggressi…
